name: iD

name: OSMyBiz

name: Every Door
description: Every Door is an Android and iOS app that lets you create and edit objects in OpenStreetMap. It supports editing node and polygon features, and creating point features like shops, benches, and building entrances. (Android / iOS / Source Code / Wiki)

name: OSM Go!
description: OSM Go! is an Android application and a Progressive Web Applications (PWA) for contributing to OpenStreetMap. (Android / WebApp / Source Code / Wiki)

description: Advanced extensible desktop editor. (Source Code / Wiki)

name: Potlatch 3
description: Native intermediate-level editor built in Adobe AIR. (Source Code / Wiki)

name: Merkaartor
description: An opensource OSM editor, written in C++ and Qt

name: OpenMapTiles

name: OSMNames

name: hdyc
